text: 🤝 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝗦𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗶𝘁 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 – 𝗧𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗻 𝗦𝘂𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗽 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱 🌞 Here’s a glimpse of our amazing teams in motion! Throughout the SummerCamp, collaboration has been at the heart of every activity ,from brainstorming ideas to tackling real challenges together. These moments capture more than just smiles , they reflect the energy, creativity, and connection that define the Talan spirit. Proud of every team and excited for what’s next! 💪✨ #TalanTunisia #Talan #TalanSummerCamp

🎬 Talan SummerCamp – Week 2: Learning, Building, Growing! 🚀 Week 2 was packed with energy and growth! Our participants went beyond the basics, diving into hands-on workshops, guided by experts and mentors who shared real-world insights and practical tools. Through teamwork, mentorship, and creative problem-solving, ideas are starting to come to life, and so is the mindset of tomorrow’s digital leaders. ✨ Proud of the progress, the passion, and the people behind it all. #Talan #TalanTunisia #TalanSummerCamp #Mentoring #Workshops #Teamwork
JARVIS 2.0 is a great example of how Talan Tunisia’s Centre of Excellence combines domain expertise, innovation, and real-world impact. Looking forward to what’s next! 👏

𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗯𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝗿𝘀𝘁 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸 𝗮𝘁 Talan 𝗦𝘂𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗽 𝗶𝗻 𝗮 𝗳𝗲𝘄 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗱𝘀? Our #SummerCamp2025 participants share their first impressions and they’re full of #energy and #excitement! The adventure has just begun. 🚀

📍 In Hammamet, Tunisia, we’ve designed a unique space created by and for those who work while traveling ✈️ At NOMAD, there’s : ❌ No cheesy evening shows. ❌ No repetitive dance routines like the Macarena. ❌ no all-yyou-can-eat buffet… and definitely no food waste 👌 ✅ Just a place to work seriously, live freely, and connect with inspiring minds. Coliving + Coworking: - Shared workspaces with real connections (not just your neighbor’s wifi) - Comfortable rooms to settle in—from one week to one year - Calm, creative, and mature atmosphere - An international community of freelancers, entrepreneurs, and digital creators Here, it’s all about focus, progress, and enjoying life wisely ✨
